EmailTemplate.subject: Article: Does {{company.Company Name:default=Your Financial Institution}} Have a Digital-First Culture?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
At the beginning of the pandemic, NCR had more than a 260% increase in digital banking traffic versus prior peak activity.
And, according to a Fortune and Deloitte study, 77% of CEOs indicated the pandemic has significantly accelerated their digital transformation plans.1
But how do FIs break free of the silos that throttle innovation—and forge a path to digital-first banking?
It starts with your culture.
Read an article on The Financial Brand from NCR’s Doug Brown <[[https://thefinancialbrand.com/107583/digital-first-banking-culture-modern-technology-cx-ncr/]]>—and see 3 steps that can help FIs make the shift to a digital-first mindset and establish a foundation to compete.
1- https://www2.deloitte.com/content/dam/Deloitte/us/Documents/finance/us-fortune-deloitte-ceo-survey-june-2020.pdf ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
